content.raw:
the homebrew build has a failure that I've seen before:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1718)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1718/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1718/
* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2956/dart-heightmap-with-bullet-and-ode/diff#comment-78382703
* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2956/dart-heightmap-with-bullet-and-ode/activity#comment-81016151

adding the following 3 lines before including `DARTCollision.hh` should fix it
~~~
#ifdef __MACTYPES__
#undef nil
#endif
~~~
content.html:
the homebrew build has a failure that I've seen before:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1718/
  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2956/dart-heightmap-with-bullet-and-ode/diff#comment-78382703
  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2956/dart-heightmap-with-bullet-and-ode/activity#comment-81016151

adding the following 3 lines before including DARTCollision.hh should fix it

#ifdef __MACTYPES__
#undef nil
#endif
